borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Erection of a front and rear roof extension, following the removal of existing front bay window roof; alterations to the existing floor level, and erection of a rear extension at second floor level over part of existing back addition; erection of a single storey lean-to side extension; erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side and rear of existing back addition; alterations to the external fa√ßade wall to the side elevation of the main building to include, building-up in brick to match existing with coping stone on top and soldier brick course slope; erection of metal railings around the perimeter on top of the remaining part of existing first floor back addition, in connection with its use as a roof terrace; bricking-up and infilling 1no. window to the side elevation, alterations to the existing roof terrace to include, re-sizing and erection of new metal railings to replace existing railings around the perimeter of the flat roof, and erection of new metal framed sliding dormer style doors to replace existing Crittall style French doors to the rear elevation of first floor back addition; installation of new metal framed windows following the removal of existing windows, to the rear elevation at ground floor level; erection of a timber clad bin store, and enlargement of existing planters in the front garden; installation of an air source heat pump enclosed in timber acoustic screening in the rear garden; landscaping of the rear garden.
